statements: SELECT * FROM at_risk_students;
SELECT student_id, student_name, age FROM at_risk_students WHERE age > 18;
SELECT student_name, academic_level FROM at_risk_students WHERE academic_level = 'Sophomore';
SELECT * FROM at_risk_students ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(*) AS num_students FROM at_risk_students GROUP BY student_id HAVING num_students > 1;
SELECT * FROM at_risk_students WHERE age > 18 ORDER BY student_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT student_name, academic_level FROM at_risk_students WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 25
SELECT student_name, course_grades->'math' AS math_grade FROM at_risk_students WHERE academic_level = 'Sophomore'
SELECT AVG(age) AS avg_age, MAX(age) AS max_age, MIN(age) AS min_age FROM at_risk_students
SELECT student_name, LENGTH(student_name) AS name_length FROM at_risk_students WHERE LENGTH(student_name) > 10 ORDER BY name_length
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, GPA FROM Students WHERE GPA > 3.5;
SELECT course_name, credit_hours FROM Courses ORDER BY credit_hours DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students WHERE student_id = 101;
SELECT AVG(GPA) AS avg_gpa FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, GPA FROM Students WHERE GPA > 3.5 ORDER BY GPA DESC
SELECT course_name, credit_hours FROM Courses WHERE credit_hours > 3 ORDER BY course_name ASC
SELECT student_name, GPA, course_name FROM Students JOIN Courses ON Students.student_id = Courses.course_id WHERE GPA > 3 AND credit_hours > 2
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT course_name, credit_hours FROM Courses WHERE credit_hours < 4 ORDER BY credit_hours ASC
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, academic_progress FROM students WHERE academic_progress = TRUE;
SELECT class_name, class_teacher, class_subject FROM classes ORDER BY class_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, grade_value FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id WHERE grade_value >= 90;
SELECT class_name, AVG(grade_value) AS average_grade FROM classes JOIN grades ON classes.class_id = grades.class_id GROUP BY class_name;

SELECT student_name, class_name, grade_value FROM students INNER JOIN classes ON students.class_id = classes.class_id INNER JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id AND students.class_id = grades.class_id WHERE academic_progress = TRUE

SELECT student_name, class_name, grade_value FROM students INNER JOIN classes ON students.class_id = classes.class_id INNER JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id AND students.class_id = grades.class_id WHERE grade_value >= 80

SELECT student_name, class_name, grade_value FROM students INNER JOIN classes ON students.class_id = classes.class_id INNER JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id AND students.class_id = grades.class_id ORDER BY grade_value DESC

SELECT student_name, class_name, AVG(grade_value) AS average_grade FROM students INNER JOIN classes ON students.class_id = classes.class_id INNER JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id AND students.class_id = grades.class_id GROUP BY student_name, class_name
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT class_id) AS total_classes, COUNT(DISTINCT student_id) AS total_students FROM grades
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, academic_program FROM Students;
SELECT course_id, course_name, department FROM Courses;
SELECT enrollment_id, student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM Enrollments;
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade FROM Grades;
SELECT student_name, academic_program FROM Students WHERE enrollment_status = 'Active';
SELECT course_name, course_description, department FROM Courses WHERE department = 'Computer Science' ORDER BY course_name DESC;

SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM Students INNER JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id INNER JOIN Courses ON Grades.course_id = Courses.course_id WHERE grade = 'A' ORDER BY student_name, course_name;
SELECT DISTINCT department FROM Courses ORDER BY department;
SELECT student_name, academic_program, grade FROM Students INNER JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id ORDER BY grade DESC, student_name;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT first_name, last_name, grade_level FROM Students WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT course_id, course_name, credits FROM Courses ORDER BY credits DESC;
SELECT assignment_name, due_date, max_score FROM Assignments WHERE course_id = 2;

SELECT s.first_name, s.last_name, c.course_name, g.score FROM Students s JOIN Enrollments e ON s.student_id = e.student_id JOIN Grades g ON e.enrollment_id = g.enrollment_id JOIN Courses c ON e.course_id = c.course_id;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT first_name, last_name, grade_level FROM Students WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, grade_level FROM Students ORDER BY grade_level DESC;
SELECT s.first_name, s.last_name, c.course_name, e.grade FROM Students s JOIN Enrollments e ON s.student_id = e.student_id JOIN Courses c ON e.course_id = c.course_id;

SELECT s.student_id, s.first_name, s.last_name, SUM(g.score) AS total_score FROM Students s JOIN Enrollments e ON s.student_id = e.student_id JOIN Grades g ON e.enrollment_id = g.enrollment_id GROUP BY s.student_id;
